name: Treadmill
description: High-performance treadmill with multiple speed settings. Supports incline adjustments for intense workouts. Sturdy build for long-lasting durability.

name: Dumbbell Set
description: Adjustable dumbbell set for versatile strength training. Durable and ergonomic design for a comfortable grip. Ideal for both beginners and pros.

name: Protein Powder
description: Premium whey protein for muscle recovery and strength. Packed with essential amino acids and low in sugar. Enhances performance and supports lean muscle growth.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat with extra cushioning for comfort. Sweat-resistant surface for better grip during workouts. Lightweight and easy to carry.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with superior cushioning. Breathable mesh upper for better airflow and comfort. Ideal for long-distance running and casual wear.

name: Sports T-Shirt
description: Moisture-wicking fabric keeps you dry and fresh. Stretchable, breathable, and designed for high performance. Perfect for training, running, or everyday use.

name: Boxing Gloves
description: Durable boxing gloves with shock-absorbing padding. Velcro strap for a secure and comfortable fit. Designed for training, sparring, and competitions.

name: Football
description: FIFA-certified match-quality football. Made with durable material for long-lasting play. Great for training and competitive matches.

name: Compression Leggings
description: Tight-fit compression leggings for muscle support. Reduces fatigue and enhances blood circulation. Ideal for gym, yoga, and running.

name: Water Bottle
description: BPA-free sports water bottle with a leak-proof lid. Keeps your drinks cold or hot for hours. Essential for hydration during workouts.
